languages.text: "Жизнь вас, мон-кай, ничему не учит. Мне начинает казаться, что вам просто не терпится угодить в наши сети".

traits.locale_text: "Благодарю за помощь, кузина. Немного жаль, что время, проведенное рядом с мон-кай, притупило твои чувства. Впрочем, эта слабость сыграла мне на руку".

languages.text: "You mon-keigh never learn. I am beginning to think that your kind is eager to step into our snares."
languages.original_text: "Жизнь вас, мон-кай, ничему не учит. Мне начинает казаться, что вам просто не терпится угодить в наши сети".

traits.locale_text: "You mon-keigh never learn. I am beginning to think that your kind is eager to step into our snares."
"Thank you for your assistance, my kin. It is somewhat regrettable that the time you spent in the company of mon-keigh has dulled your instincts. Then again, that weakness put me at an advantage."
"You mon-keigh never learn. I am beginning to think that your kind is eager to step into our snares."
"You mon-keigh never learn. I am beginning to think that your kind is eager to step into our snares."
"You mon-keigh never learn. I am beginning to think that your kind is eager to step into our snares."

languages.text: “你们这些猴子永远都不肯吸取教训。我甚至开始觉得，你们就是打算一头冲进我们的陷阱。”
languages.original_text: "You mon-keigh never learn. I am beginning to think that your kind is eager to step into our snares."

traits.locale_text: “你们这些猴子永远都不肯吸取教训。我甚至开始觉得，你们就是打算一头冲进我们的陷阱。”

languages.text: 「お前たちモン＝ケイは何も学ばないな。もはや、お前たち種族は我々の罠に喜んで飛び込んできているかのようだ」
languages.original_text: "You mon-keigh never learn. I am beginning to think that your kind is eager to step into our snares."

traits.locale_text: 「お前たちモン＝ケイは何も学ばないな。もはや、お前たち種族は我々の罠に喜んで飛び込んできているかのようだ」

languages.text: «Los mon-keigh nunca aprendéis. Estoy empezando a creer que disfrutáis cayendo en nuestras trampas».
languages.original_text: "You mon-keigh never learn. I am beginning to think that your kind is eager to step into our snares."

traits.locale_text: «Los mon-keigh nunca aprendéis. Estoy empezando a creer que disfrutáis cayendo en nuestras trampas».

languages.text: « Décidément, les mon-keigh n'apprennent jamais. Je vais finir par croire que vous prenez plaisir à foncer tout droit dans nos pièges. »
languages.original_text: "You mon-keigh never learn. I am beginning to think that your kind is eager to step into our snares."

traits.locale_text: « Décidément, les mon-keigh n'apprennent jamais. Je vais finir par croire que vous prenez plaisir à foncer tout droit dans nos pièges. »

languages.text: "Ihr Chem-Pan-Sey werdet es nie lernen. Ich glaube langsam, Ihr habt es darauf abgesehen, in unsere Fallen zu laufen."
languages.original_text: "You mon-keigh never learn. I am beginning to think that your kind is eager to step into our snares."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr Chem-Pan-Sey werdet es nie lernen. Ich glaube langsam, Ihr habt es darauf abgesehen, in unsere Fallen zu laufen."

languages.text: "Siz mon-keighler hiç mi akıllanmazsınız? Tuzaklarımıza bile isteye mi düşüyorsunuz acaba?"
languages.original_text: "You mon-keigh never learn. I am beginning to think that your kind is eager to step into our snares."

traits.locale_text: "Siz mon-keighler hiç mi akıllanmazsınız? Tuzaklarımıza kendi isteğinizle mi düşüyorsunuz acaba?"
